title: Chief Spookz takes a look at NVIDIA GeForce Experience Early Access Share Beta

embed.description: Participate in the Early Access Share Beta now! Head over to the following link: http://www.geforce.com/geforce-experience/gfe-beta Thanks to our partners G2A.COM, Nvidia and Logitech G: https://www.g2a.com/r/chiefs-esports-... https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAAustralia http://www.nvidia.com/page/home.html https://www.facebook.com/logitechgaming http://gaming.logitech.com/ You can follow the Chiefs at: https://twitter.com/ChiefsESC https://www.facebook.com/ChiefsESC

body:
The revamped version comes with a nifty in-game overlay that makes capturing and sharing your highlights and content even easier, especially for those first person League of Legends perspectives, as well as GameStream Co-op, a feature to directly stream and share your games' controls with a friend!

Though GameStream is probably a little irrelevant for League of Legends (fairly sure it could be account sharing), being able to instantly record your highlights this easily, or even full gameplay, is definitely helpful for the guys to develop their skills and share their experience.

Check out his video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LaBLQNdQJyo

And head over here to download it if you want to try it yourself. Look forward to seeing some awesome highlights from everyone! http://www.geforce.com/geforce-experience/gfe-beta

replies.body: Do you think it would run good on a GTX680??
He needs to make his bed.

27th around 12pm

its sunday.. everyone is lazy on sunday.

Do you know when it will be in Open Beta/Full Release?

Early access seems a bit risky to me.

I'd be able to run it ezpz with my SLI'ed GTX 970s though...
